 returns the FT as a complex array

Detailed Description

FFT Class.

The FFT class allows an easy interface to the FFT routines.

float FFT::deltaFrequency (  int  number = 0  ) 
 

Returns the spacing between frequency pts at which the FFT was calculated, if number is passed in, it is used for calculation, otherwise size of last FFT calculation is used
